p: The recombinant proteases M pro and PL pro can be easily expressed in Escherichia coli or other organism, purified by routine biochemical methods ( Lin et al., 2004, 2005) and used for cell-free cleavage assay ( Lin et al., 2005; Chou et al., 2008; Chen et al., 2009; Jo et al., 2020) or cell-based cleavage assay ( Lin et al., 2005), as well as for study of x-ray structures of the unliganded SARS-CoV-2 proteins and their complexes with potential drugs ( Zhang et al., 2020b).
